name: The Protectors
description:
~~~Exclusively Created for: Pizza Jam 3/23/2019~~~

Use the 'POWER OF LOVE' to empower the others around you and to survive a hateful beast that roams about.

CONTROLS : 

[] Keyboard arrow keys (Up,Down,Left,Right)

[] Press Enter to restart at any time

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Jam Reference Info:

"Make a game based on the name of one of these level sequences and SAY WHICH ONE IN YOUR DESCRIPTION! http://info.sonicretro.org/List_of_Shadow_the_Hedgehog_Library_sequences"

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
